DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to create a patient registry to collect and analyze information on subjects treated with the CryoSpray Ablation™ System post-510K approval.
DOC.detailed_description: The proposed registry is a prospective, multi-center study of patients that are currently undergoing CryoSpray Ablation™. A maximum of 50 investigational sites will participate in this study. The study population consists of patients who are being treated with the CryoSpray Ablation™ System for thoracic diseases. Enrolled subjects must have a signed consent form for data collection.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are being treated with the CryoSpray Ablation™ System for lung and for thoracic diseases. Subjects with thoracic or airway obstructions and diseases who were not treated with the CryoSpray Ablation™ System. Subjects under the age of 18 years. Subjects unable to provide consent.
